content.title: Sathiyavanimuthu Ammaiyar Ninaivu Free Supply of Sewing Machine Scheme
content.department: Social Welfare and Women Empowerment Department
content.beneficiary: Destitute women, widows, deserted women, differently abled individuals, socially affected women, women from economically weaker sections
content.details: The 'Sathiyavanimuthu Ammaiyar Ninaivu Free Supply of Sewing Machine Scheme' is a state scheme launched by the Social Welfare and Women Empowerment Department, Government of Tamil Nadu. The scheme objective is to supply sewing machines free of cost to increase the self-employment potential for rehabilitation of destitute women/widows, deserted women, differently abled men and women, socially affected women and women from economically weaker sections.
benefits: Sewing machines and accessories are provided at free of cost.
eligibility: The applicant's annual income should not exceed â‚¹72,000/-
The age of the applicant should be between 20 to 40 years
The applicant should have knowledge of tailoring

The applicant should be ANY ONE of the following: Destitute Woman, Widow, Deserted Woman, Differently Abled Man, Differently Abled Woman, Socially Affected Woman, Woman From Economically Weaker Sections
content.application_process: Online - via CSCs. The applicant should gather copies of the necessary documents needed to apply for the concerned scheme, visit the nearest Common Service Center (CSC) and complete the Biometric Verification Process, fill in all the mandatory fields in the application form and upload copies of all the mandatory documents, and request a receipt or acknowledgement from the concerned authority.
documents_required: Certificate showing that the applicant has knowledge in tailoring

faqs.question: I am a 45-year-old woman from an economically weaker section who is interested in tailoring. Am I eligible for the scheme?
faqs.answer: Unfortunately, no. The age limit for applicants is between 20 and 40 years old.

faqs.question: I am a man with a physical disability who wants to learn tailoring to become self-employed. Am I eligible for the scheme?
faqs.answer: Yes, the scheme is open to differently-abled men and women, including those with physical disabilities, as long as they meet the other eligibility criteria.

faqs.question: Can I apply for the scheme directly online without visiting the CSC?
faqs.answer: Currently, no. Applying for the scheme requires visiting the nearest Common Service Center (CSC).

faqs.question: I live in a remote area and have limited access to the internet. Can I still apply for the scheme?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can still apply by visiting the nearest CSC.

faqs.question: I lost my Destitute Certificate. Can I apply using other documents?
faqs.answer: While certificates are required, you can inquire with the CSC about the possibility of submitting alternative documents.

faqs.question: What specific type of sewing machine is provided under the scheme?
faqs.answer: The specific type of sewing machine provided might vary depending on availability and budget allocation.

faqs.question: Do I need to return the sewing machine if I decide not to pursue tailoring?
faqs.answer: Yes, the sewing machine is provided with the expectation that you will use it for self-employment purposes.

faqs.question: I am a transgender woman who wants to learn tailoring. Can I apply for the scheme?
faqs.answer: The scheme's guidelines don't explicitly mention eligibility based on gender identity.

faqs.question: Will the sewing machine come with any accessories?
faqs.answer: Yes, the scheme typically provides basic sewing machine accessories.

faqs.question: Can I choose the brand or model of the sewing machine?
faqs.answer: No, the scheme provides pre-selected models based on government procurement.

faqs.question: Can I sell the sewing machine I receive under the scheme?
faqs.answer: No, selling the sewing machine is strictly prohibited.

faqs.question: Is there a warranty offered on the sewing machine provided by the scheme?
faqs.answer: The sewing machine might come with a limited manufacturer's warranty.
